data.name: Preset Message 1
data.message: “You actually think… unlike my idiot partner.”

data.name: Preset Message 2
data.message: “Even Hell runs on money. I'd be just fine.”

data.name: Preset Message 3
data.message: “If you let your guard down… you're dead.”

data.name: Preset Message 5
data.message: “It's only fitting that I take your heart to replace the one you've destroyed!”
